start.speaker: Alicia
start.content: Oh! H-hello again. I... I just needed to get out of the shop for a little while. All the dust... it gets in my throat.

options.label: It's nice to see you out.

ask_about_laura.speaker: Alicia
ask_about_laura.content: Yes! Everything is... fine. Laura, she... she liked the gift. I think. She's wearing it. Under her apron, so no one else can see. It's... nice. Thank you, again. For helping me.

youre_welcome_text.speaker: Alicia
youre_welcome_text.content: (She gives you a genuine, heartfelt smile.)

nice_to_see_you.speaker: Alicia
nice_to_see_you.content: Thank you. It's... a little loud. But the tea is good. It's nice to just... sit for a moment. And not worry about what needs restocking.
